author: Marek Novak (NXA17138)
message:
Several changes for future v1.2.0 release

- Added RL_CLEAR_USED_BUFFERS config option
- Added NULL checking in endpoint handling functions
- Added LPC5410X support
- Renamed env.h and compiler.h and other files with generic names to
avoid linking problem
- Fixed RPMSG_BUFFER_SIZE preprocessor assertion

Signed-off-by: Marek Novak (NXA17138) <marek.novak@nxp.com>
files_changed: lib/include/compiler.h, lib/include/env.h, lib/include/platform/imx6sx_m4/platform.h, lib/include/platform/imx6sx_m4/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/platform/imx7d_m4/platform.h, lib/include/platform/imx7d_m4/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/platform/lpc5410x/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/platform/lpc5411x/platform.h, lib/include/platform/lpc5411x/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/rpmsg_compiler.h, lib/include/rpmsg_default_config.h, lib/include/rpmsg_env.h, lib/include/rpmsg_lite.h, lib/include/rpmsg_ns.h, lib/include/virtqueue.h, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/environment/env_bm.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/environment/env_freertos.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/environment/rpmsg_env_bm.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/environment/rpmsg_env_freertos.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imx6sx_m4/platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imx6sx_m4/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imx7d_m4/platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imx7d_m4/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/lpc5410x/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/lpc5411x/platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/lpc5411x/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/rpmsg_lite.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/rpmsg_ns.c

author: Michal Princ (nxa17570)
message:
RPMsg-Lite update 07/2021

- Updated RL_BUFFER_COUNT documentation (issue #10)
- Addressed MISRA 21.6 rule violation in rpmsg_env.h (use SDK's PRINTF in MCUXpressoSDK examples, otherwise stdio printf is used)
- Added environment layers for XOS
- Fixed incorrect description of the rpmsg_lite_get_endpoint_from_addr function
- Updated imxrt600_hifi4 platform layer
- Added support for i.MX RT500, i.MX RT1160 and i.MX RT1170 multicore platforms
- Updated version to 3.1.2
files_changed: README.md, doc, doxygen/Doxyfile.rpmsglite, doxygen/mainpage_rpmsg_lite.md, lib/include/platform/imxrt1160/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/platform/imxrt1170/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/platform/imxrt500_fusionf1/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/platform/imxrt500_m33/rpmsg_platform.h, lib/include/rpmsg_default_config.h, lib/include/rpmsg_env.h, lib/include/rpmsg_lite.h, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/environment/rpmsg_env_xos.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imxrt1160/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imxrt1170/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imxrt500_fusionf1/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imxrt500_m33/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/porting/platform/imxrt600_hifi4/rpmsg_platform.c, lib/rpmsg_lite/rpmsg_lite.c, lib/virtio/virtqueue.c

author: Axel Le Bourhis
message: [MCUX-77083] Fix typo causing a build issue when using RL_ALLOW_CUSTOM_SHMEM_CONFIG\n\nSigned-off-by: Axel Le Bourhis <axel.lebourhis@nxp.com>
